section.heading: Member approval of other disposition of assets.
section.text: A sale, lease, exchange, license, or other disposition of assets of a limited cooperative association, other than a disposition described in § 29-1014.01, shall require approval of the association’s members under §§ 29-1014.03 and 29-1014.04 if the disposition leaves the association without significant continuing business activity.

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in § 29-1014.01, § 29-1014.03, and § 29-1014.04.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 1502 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
